00083     enum shapeType
00084     {
00085         NONE = 0,
00086         SPHERE,
00087         BOX,
00088         CYLINDER,
00089         CAPSULE,
00090         CONE,
00091         PLANE
00092     };
00093     enum billboardType { RELATIVE, POINT_EYE, STAY_UP };
00094     
00095     virtual void setContext (const char *newvalue);
00096 
00100     void setShape            (shapeType t);
00101     void setBillboard        (billboardType t);
00102 
00110     void setColor            (float red, float green, float blue, float alpha);
00111     void setRenderBin        (int i);
00112     void setLighting        (int i);
00113

00120

00122 
00123     int getShape() const { return (int)shape; }
00124     int getBillboard() const { return (int)billboard; }
00125     osg::Vec4 getColor() const { return _color; };

00127     int getLighting() const { return (int)lightingEnabled; }
00128 
00129     
00134     virtual std::vector<lo_message> getState() const;

00136     shapeType shape;
00137     
00138 
00139     billboardType billboard;

00141     osg::Vec4 _color;
00142 
00143     // We can have a texture on the shape, loaded from a local file
00144     std::string texturePath;

00147     bool lightingEnabled;
